word_mean: 又称“串话”。在给定话路里，由其他话路信号所导致的干扰。

sentence.Network_en: The frequently visited problems were crosstalk from adjacent layers and transmission loss.
sentence.Network_cn: 在经常访问的问题是从邻近层和传输损耗串扰.
